text: @SenSchumer It’s May 20, and Schmuck Schumer is still full of shit. Meanwhile Governor Cuomo sent Covid-19 Patients back to their nursing homes, instead being given the opportunity to use the US Comfort and Javits Center facilitates! https://t.co/bB6mf9QVXC
